welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Sudan ERR Bot
introMessage: The ERR bot will help you with project applications and reporting on ERR impact and sharing information with the community and donors.
chooseMainMenu: Choose Projects to apply for projects and review status. Choose Reporting to report on your existing projects. Choose Feedback to share your experience.
projectsInstructions: Please select an option to apply for a project or review project status.
reportingInstructions: Please select an option to report by filling a form or uploading a photo of a form.
selectProject: Select a project to continue with reporting.
feedbackInstructions: Please select an option for feedback.
